app.name: Chiu Project
app.about.modal.title: About
app.about.modal.message: Chiu Project provides data about the current noise level in a place. The goal of this IoT experiment is to help to prevent hearing loss due to noise pollution. The data collected can be useful for further analysis to help to understand how the noise level in a certain place has been increasing over time.
noise.meter.chart.noise.title: Noise level
noise.meter.chart.noise.label: Decibels
noise.levels.table.title: References
noise.levels.table.source.label: Learn more
noise.player.title: Noise simulator
noise.player.message: Select the noise level on the slider below. The playback can be controlled using the buttons start and stop. Some sounds may harm your hearing so be careful, please.
noise.player.source.label: Source
